ygData.subject: Re: rts and skull of jhen tra
ygData.msgSnippet: pulled this from the EQ Lizer website:     Staff of Writhing The staff of writhing is one of the various skull staff s in the game(which look similar to the
ygData.messageBody:
pulled this from the EQ'Lizer website:
�
�

Staff of Writhing


The staff of writhing is one of the various skull staff's in the game(which
look similar to the staff that the Priest of Discord is equipping). This
particular staff is a 1 handed blunt weapon and can be equipped by
Necromancers, Enchanters, Wizards, Magicians and Bards. It has a damage of
9, a delay of 33 and has the effect of chaotic feedback(which does 48 points
of damage when successful).

Duhase�

�-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Wang [mailto:twang@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:35 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


Its called Staff of Writhing or Writhing Staff and is 1 (one) hand blunt.
Its gotten in a really really tough place for 30 + people. Its stats are
awesome of course, however, we clerics cannot use it. Its�restricted to true
casters like wizards and enchanters. Which is too bad as most of them suck
at 1h blunt.

----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 8:12 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


its not a rumor...� ive seen to Players running around in Crushbone weilding
a staff with a skull on the end of it... just like the priest of discord.

Duhase

-----Original Message-----
From: Jannus Malus [ mailto:jannus_@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 2:35 PM
To: everquest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>

I've heard that the runed totem staff and skull of jhen tra can be used
together/in conjunction with each other, yet there is no obvious way to do
this.� Is this information wrong, or am I just missing something?� Thanks in

advance.
Jannus
